answers.answer: I think you should - a negative mindset can only bring a negative outcome :-( I know it's scary, but you have to be positive that your little angel will be born healthy as can be. My aunt had preeclampsia during her second pregnancy and my cousin is a completely normal, healthy, beautiful ten year old girl! :-) Preeclampsia isn't a death sentence honey, both you and your munchkin can, and I believe will, be completely healthy :-)
thnx im jus a lil scared specially with this being my 1st pregnacy

I had preclampsia with my son and I already have high blood pressure with this one too. Mt advice listen to everything the Dr tells u about taking it easy and what not and everything will be just fine! :) BTW my son is 4 now. ;)

title: should i continue buyin baby clothes
